name: products_search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool wayfair.
Tool description: This API helps to query for all information about categories, products, etcâ€¦ as on wayfair.com
API description: Search for products by a specified keyword and optional filters, with support for pagination and sorting.

keyword.description: The term or phrase to search for related products.

filters.description: The value of filter_string_unencoded fields returned right in this endpoint to filter products, pass this parameter multiple times for multiple filters. Ex : ...&filters=colorList~White&filters=masterClID~180&...

curpage.description: The current page number for paginated results. Default is 1.

itemsperpage.description: The number of items to display per page. Default is 48.

sortby.description: The value of sort_value fields returned right in this endpoint. Default is 0
